author: alon.ssv.network
content:
That's not true, SSV.Network is not based on any other code. Not sure how you came to posses this opinion, surely not from looking at the code. 

The SSV.Network node has a signer interface in it, the goal is to make it compatible with well used remote signers. As the name suggests it's a node to the network, it shouldn't and wouldn't manage keys.
